data.name: Go To Heck
data.detailed_description:
Go To Heck is a fast-paced 2d sidescrolling action roguelite, descending through Cyberheck and destroying all the devils in your way. Use your railgun to fly through levels, build your rage, dodge attacks, and defeat enemies and bosses with speed and accuracy. Go To Heck features short runs and minimal meta-progression, allowing you to pick up the game at any time and test your mettle.



Go To Heck is packed with variety: 3 playable classes, over 25 enemies, and over 50 items. Construct your build over the course of a 10 minute run!



We're in early access at the moment, but there's only more content and more systems on their way. Look forward to a game with faced paced moment-to-moment action alongside strategic depth.

data.short_description: Go To Heck is a fast-paced 2d sidescrolling action roguelite, descending through Cyberheck and using your railgun to destroy all the devils in your way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3317u
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Anything from the last 5 years
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
